about_the_game:
Nanbo Wen is a game player.

As the "System Collapse" intensifies, players who narrowly survive must scavenge and struggle to survive in the vast, wild game world. Nanbo Wen is one of the few players who can travel between different planes and move freely, using his quick tongue to cheat and increase the number of victims in the game...

In an unassuming little village, there lies a legendary "Pandora's Gem". When such a secret information falls into his ears, he knows that the opportunity to make a fortune has come. This ancient gemstone is full of countless legends, with many believing that it contains the mighty power left by ancient times, but what exactly the power is is still a matter of debate.

However, Nanbo Wen is not interested in the many legends of "Pandora's Gem". What matters to him is how to get his hands on it and how to use it to make a fortune. However, he doesn't realize that his fate will be overturned by this gemstone...

"Outland Rogue" is a single-player game where you explore and solve puzzles in an open world consisting of dozens of regions and over 200 NPCs. You are a clever player, and this game does not want to waste your time. There are no repetitive patterns; various events will add new ideas to the overall picture. Hence, this is a game full of ideas.

Join the wishlist and look forward to your participation!

fullgame.name: Outland Rogue - A Wicked but Serious RPG

name: 异界无赖 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A low-quality RPG game filled with useless NPCs, silly fetch quests, childish humor, expressionless main character, and other nonsense. It's a massive adventure with over 10 hours of content and a bunch of miscellaneous events. Requires mouse and keyboard to play.
